message.description: The message or description of the tag.

target.description: The target or object that the tag points to.

release.description: Details about the release associated with the tag.

tag_name.description: The name of the release tag.

protected.description: Indicates whether the tag is protected.

commit.description: Details about the commit associated with the tag.

commit_id.description: Unique identifier for the commit associated with the tag.

project_id.description: Unique identifier of the project to which the tag belongs.
